description: Certificate of Lawful Development confirming lawful Implementation of planning application ref. 21/3832/FUL for addition of third-floor mansard and fifth-floor mansard roof office space with associated fire escape; solar panels and plant on roof level
decision_conditions:
The applicant is informed that for the avoidance of doubt this decsion is based on the following evidence:-

Photographs of the AC being  removed (named Parkway House AC remove 1 and 2)
